name: expandedFileNumber
description: Extended file number. (Bytes 1 and 2 of GHB1 must be set to FFFF for ffids greater than 9999)

name: extendedChannelSetsPerScanType
description: Extended channel sets/scan types. (Byte 29 of GHB1 must be set to FF for numbers greater than 99)

name: extendedHeaderBlocks
description: Extended header blocks (Byte 31 of GHB1 must be set to FF if using more than 99 extended header blocks)

name: externalHeaderBlocks
description: External header blocks (Byte 32 of GHB1 must be set to FF if using more than 99 external header blocks)

name: extendedRecordLength
description: Extended record length in milliseconds (Bytes 26 and 27 of GHB1 must be set to FFF)

name: generalHeaderBlockNumber
description: General header block number (Set to 2 for this block)

name: sequenceNumber
description: Line's unique sequence number (=0 if not valid)
